value:
$WmMPID_クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Normal,Face|I'm Claude. Coming up with brilliant
schemes, I can handle. No problem.$k$pBut I'm not much for fighting. Go
easy on me!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I have something I must tell you,
$Nu...$k$pI...remembered something. Something
terribly important.$k$pPrince Alfonse and Princess
Sharena... We met. Before.$k$pNot in the Askr where you live, but
here...in this world.$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$Fi2000|I am very glad to meet you! My
name is Sharena, and this is my
older brother, Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|It's good to meet you. I am Alfonse,
the prince of Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Princess Sharena and Prince
Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|And you are?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, don't worry. If you prefer not
to say...don't feel pressured.$k$pBut in that case, I wonder what to
call you? Hmm...$k$pI'll just have to come up with a
nickname! Doesn't that sound
lovely? Oh, I hope you don't mind...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Hee-hee.$k$pOh, Princess Sharena...you are quite
something. You're bursting with the
light of life...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Re—really? When you put it so
seriously, I feel a bit...embarrassed!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I am Eir. It is good to meet you,
prince and princess...$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|
